Program to Improve Productivity and Competitiveness III
Programático para la Mejora de la Productividad y la Competitividad III

description.narrative: Second PBL operation in the Programmatic series. Objective is to contribute to increases in firm productivity and competitiveness, through the improvement of the business climate and the strengthening of the institutional and policy framework and instruments to support productive development and innovation.
Commitment in fourth quarter of 2014
Disbursement in fourth quarter of 2014
Interest repayment in fourth quarter of 2015
Interest repayment in fourth quarter of 2016
Interest repayment in second quarter of 2015
Interest repayment in second quarter of 2016
Interest repayment in second quarter of 2017
Interest repayment in third quarter of 2017
Loan repayment in third quarter of 2017
